component.name: deleteAttributes
component.description: Remove items, attributes, or attribute values from the domain

component.name: getAttributes
component.description: Retrieve the attributes and values of any specified item ID

component.name: putAttributes
component.description: Add, modify, or remove data within the Amazon SimpleDB domains

component.name: batchPutAttributes
component.description: BatchPutAttributes operation perform multiple PutAttribute operations in a single call

component.name: batchDeleteAttributes
component.description: Performs multiple DeleteAttributes operations in a single call
